# VS Code Features

# Review Selection
Select the code you want to review, then:
- Right-click -> Generate Code - > Review

Let's review one of the backend APIs in /backend/server.ts

# Customized Review Selection Instructions
We can customize selection review using custom instructions - add natural language instructions in your copilot-instructions.md file, like:
```
When performing a code review, apply the checks in the `/security/security-checklist.md` file.

When performing a code review, focus on readability and avoid nested ternary operators.
```

# Review Uncommitted Changes
In the Source Control View:
- Click "Code Review - Uncommitted Changes" (icon '< >')

NOTE: Code Review is available also in JetBrains!
